ErickWendel /

      semana-javascript-expert05---Todas as aulas da Semana JS Expert 5.0 - Google Drive Clone

wangdoc /

      clang-tutorial---C 语言教程

0voice /

      Introduction-to-Golang---【未来服务器端编程语言】最全空降golang资料补给包（满血战斗），包含文章，书籍，作者论文，理论分析，开源框架，云原生，大佬视频，大厂实战分享ppt

TheAlgorithms /

      Python---All Algorithms implemented in Python

andrecronje /

      rarity---d20srd reference implementation codified in solidity

microsoft /

      ML-For-Beginners---12 weeks, 25 lessons, 50 quizzes, classic Machine Learning for all

FiloSottile /

      age---A simple, modern and secure encryption tool (and Go library) with small explicit keys, no config options, and UNIX-style composability.

xfangfang /

      Macast---Macast is a cross-platform application which using mpv as DLNA Media Renderer.

PaddlePaddle /

      PaddleOCR---Awesome multilingual OCR toolkits based on PaddlePaddle （practical ultra lightweight OCR system, support 80+ languages recognition, provide data annotation and synthesis tools, support training and deployment among server, mobile, embedded and IoT devices）

kurogai /

      100-redteam-projects---Projects for security students

cockroachdb /

      cockroach---CockroachDB - the open source, cloud-native distributed SQL database.

girliemac /

      a-picture-is-worth-a-1000-words---I am trying to describe complex matters in simple doodles!

vxunderground /

      MalwareSourceCode---Collection of malware source code for a variety of platforms in an array of different programming languages.

alibaba /

      nacos---an easy-to-use dynamic service discovery, configuration and service management platform for building cloud native applications.

freefq /

      free---翻墙、免费翻墙、免费科学上网、免费节点、免费梯子、免费ss/v2ray/trojan节点、蓝灯、谷歌商店、翻墙梯子

30-seconds /

      30-seconds-of-code---Short JavaScript code snippets for all your development needs

orico /

      www.mlcompendium.com---The Machine Learning & Deep Learning Compendium is an open knowledge-sharing project compiled using Gitbook.

WorldQL /

      mammoth---

jackfrued /

      Python-100-Days---Python - 100天从新手到大师

bespoyasov /

      frontend-clean-architecture---React + TypeScript app built using clean architecture principles.

dankamongmen /

      notcurses---blingful character graphics/TUI library. definitely not curses.

HashLips /

      generative-art-opensource---Create generative art by using the canvas api and node js, feel free to contribute to this repo with new ideas.

countercept /

      chainsaw---Rapidly Search and Hunt through Windows Event Logs

alexeygrigorev /

      mlbookcamp-code---The code from the Machine Learning Bookcamp book and a free course based on the book

Anuken /

      Mindustry---A sandbox tower defense game
